properties.body:
CARIBBEAN SEA.
COLUMBIA TO PANAMA.
1. 44 FOOT S/V KOULA, FOUR PERSONS ON BOARD,
   OVERDUE SANTA MARTA (11-12N 074-12W)
   TO BOCA DEL TORO (09-18N 082-12W).
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO
   KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO U.S. COAST GUARD MIAMI,
   PHONE: 305 415 6800, E-MAIL: RCCMIAMI@USCG.MIL.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1446/14.
